CustomField.formula: If ( Not(IsNull ( First_Welcome_Email__c )) && Not ( IsNull ( Employees_Loaded__c )), ( First_Welcome_Email__c - Employees_Loaded__c - 2*( floor((First_Welcome_Email__c - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7) - floor((Employees_Loaded__c- DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7))),Null)
CustomField.label: Welcome Email timeframe
